title.narrative: Center for Kirkeligt Udviklingssamarbejde (CKU) - pool grants related to religious liberty (tros- og religionsfrihed)

description.narrative: CKU - Pool grants concerning efforts related to religious liberty.

With this grant, the Danish Ministry of Foreign Affairs support the targeted funding window for Freedom of Religion or Belief (FoRB). The purpose of the FoRB window is to support targeted efforts to increase respect for and protection and promotion of religious freedom. Projects financed through the FoRB window must be in agreement with and support the Danish government's strategy for FoRB.
Center for Church-Based Development (CKU) administers the FoRB window together with the CKU Pooled Fund. As opposed to the CKU Pooled Fund the FoRB window is open to Danish civil society organisations - faith-based as well as non faith-based - who are not members of (CKU).
Due to its nature as a pooled fund operational results are general and highly aggregated. The MFA contribution is thus reflected in the overall results reporting by the partner. For more information on the FoRB window please refer to the hyperlink below.
https://cku.dk/en/knowledge-center/freedom-of-religion-and-belief/
